definitions.definition: Relating to or connected with the sea or its uses (as navigation, commerce, etc.).
definitions.example: I enjoy maritime activities such as yachting and deep sea diving.

definitions.definition: Bordering on the sea; living near the seacoast; coastal.
definitions.example: the maritime states; a maritime people

definitions.definition: Inhabiting the seashore; living coastwise; littoral. (distinguished from marine)
Of or relating to a sailor or seaman; nautical.
